on reading compounds: 宋【ソウ】Song dynasty (China, 960-1279), Sung dynasty, Liu Song dynasty (China, 420-479), Liu Sung dynasty, Song (ancient Chinese state, 11th century-286 BCE), Sung
宋音【ソウオン】sō-on, Song reading, on reading of a kanji based on Song dynasty and later Chinese (esp. in words related to Zen Buddhism)
北宋【ホクソウ】Northern Song dynasty (China, 960-1127)
入宋【ニッソウ】journeying to Song China during the Heian and Kamakura periods
